snippet.title: Hyperspace Dogfights Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Hyperspace Dogfights on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/842170/Hyperspace_Dogfights/

About Hyperspace Dogfights
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.

About Sleeper Games
Leipzig-based Sleeper Games is an independent game studio consisting  Stefan Widany as well as various local and international collaborators. The studio focuses on iterating upon powerful game design concepts and remixes them into sweet new blends of experience.


Contact Section
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Sleeper_Games
Mail: stefan@sleepergames.com
Game Site: http://hyperspacedogfights.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hyperspacedogfights/
Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/enuit_demotrax
Project Trello: https://trello.com/b/JEMcU3rX/hyperspace-dogfights-development
HDog Forum: http://hyperspaceadmiralsforum.prophpbb.com/forum15.html
